name: Dice Mentality - Mini Jam 83
description:
Roll the dice and try to take out the boss with a health bar that never truly stays the same. Use different weapons and enemies to your advantage and hope that you can survive your own mentality.

Controls - Play In Full Screen

WASD or Up, Down, Left, Right -> Move Your Player 

Aim -> Mouse

Shoot -> Left Click

Made For The Mini Jam 83 - Theme: Dread - Limitation: Dice Must Be A Mechanic
